properties.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Coast; Coastal Del Norte
properties.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued February 3 at 1:50PM PST until February 4 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Del Norte and Northern Humboldt counties.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other
sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor
plumbing.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas more than a half mile from the coast
in the valleys are expected to see temperatures drop into the
upper 20s. Areas closer to the coast and at higher elevations
will see temperatures drop to around freezing.
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

NWSheadline: HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST TUESDAY
